title: Instructional Design Strategies to Increase Participation of Multicultural/Low-Income Students in Science Gifted Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and experience in operating gifted education programs
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening teachers' capacity to design and operate science gifted programs for multicultural/low-income students

learning_goals: Assess the potential of multicultural/low-income students using revised identification procedures
Improve engagement rates of CLED (Culturally and Linguistically Diverse) students by over 30% using customized science education design strategies
Ensure sustainability of gifted programs by establishing support systems linked to home and school

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
